title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: The issue occurs in Build 200110251 where the ShiftLeft behavior behaves unexpectedly when dealing with a combination of spaces and tabs.
OB: When executing ShiftLeft on lines containing a mixture of spaces and tabs in a default text editor, no movement or alignment change occurs as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that executing ShiftLeft should correctly indent the lines regardless of the combination of spaces and tabs present.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open a default text editor.
2. Enter the following: <space><tab>some text<tab>some text2.
3. Highlight the two lines mentioned.
4. Execute ShiftLeft.
   - Observe that there's no indentation movement.
